name: Bruteris
description:
Bruteris is a new take on the classic game Tetris. It takes the basic puzzle concept of Tetris and transforms it into a 3D parkour style game. 

Navigate through the environment, stack the tiles, and come out on top. 

_____________________________________________________________________

GROUP MEMBERS:

Murley Herrle-Fanning - Programmer, Tetris functionality

Reyhan Ismail - Programmer/VFX, Block codes

Christian Pomponio - Artist, Character Design 

Maykel Faragalla - UI Designer, Menus + Minimap 

Shaiyan Azim - Skybox

_____________________________________________________________________
